text: Janice Hiromi Kawaye (born April 4, 1970) is an American voice actress known for her roles as Ami in the cartoon Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi which aired on Cartoon Network in the mid-2000s, Jenny Wakeman, the protagonist in My Life as a Teenage Robot, and Gi in Captain Planet and the Planeteers. In video games, she voices Ayane in the Ninja Gaiden series as well as Peko Pekoyama in the Danganronpa franchise. ==Early life== Kawaye was born to parents who are both of Japanese descent. ==Filmography== ===Animation=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |+ List of voice performances in animation !!
